title: Physical chemistry of polymers
creator_credit: Bell Telephone Laboratories, Sol Dworkin and John Friedman
brief_description: Dr. F H Winslow discusses how the physical properties of polymers are affected by molecular size and shape, the packing of molecular clusters as well as the strength of forces between molecules. Includes experiments and demonstrations one of which visually simulates the effects of thermal agitation on rubber molecules.
